hero.heroTitle: Your Journey to Mental Health and Happiness.
hero.heroSubtitle: We Are Here to Support You in
hero.heroDescription: Let us help you build a bridge of hope and optimism towards a better tomorrow, where happiness and mental peace are the prevailing features in your life.

ourSpecialties.title: Our Specialties
ourSpecialties.description: At Talbinah, we bring together a team of experts specialized in multiple fields to provide personalized support and guidance suitable for each individual. Whether you need psychological guidance, behavioral therapy, or any other specialty, we are here to help you on the path to recovery and overall improvement of your psychological state.

doctors.title: We connect you with your specialist therapist
doctors.description: At Talbinah, we bring together a team of experts specialized in multiple fields to provide personalized support and guidance suitable for each individual. Whether you need psychological guidance, behavioral therapy, or any other specialty, we are here to help you on the path to recovery and overall improvement of your psychological state.

features.title: Features
features.description: World-class care for everyone. Our health system provides unparalleled specialized health care.

auth.joinMasdar: Join the Al Masdar International Recruitment platform to be able to obtain the workers allocated to you

auth.pleaseEnterBasicInformation2: Please enter you basic information, user name and create password for your account
auth.pleaseEnterBasicInformation4: Complete your company information, company name and your company address

auth.pleaseEnterValidTax: Please enter valid value, should be Between 8 to 20 Characters Long.
auth.forgetPasswordText: Don’t worry! It happens. Please enter your email and we’ll send OTP to your email
auth.checkEmail: Please enter the change code sent to your mobile number
auth.notReceive: You did not receive the password?
auth.welcomeToMasdar: Welcome to the Al Masdar International Recruitment platform

validations.fullNameLength: Full name length must be larger than or equal 2
validations.nameLength: Name length must be larger than or equal 2
validations.passwordPattern: Your password must be 8 or more characters, contains upper & lower case letters, numbers, at least one special character (!%*?&|...)
validations.notMatch: Password didn’t match, please try again*
validations.validVatId: Please enter valid vat number, must be Must Be Between 11 and 20 Characters Long.
validations.addressLength: Sorry! The Address Must Be Between 4 And 100 Characters Long.
validations.oneNumeric: It must contain one or more numbers
validations.eightChars: Must contain at least 8 characters (12 characters recommended)
validations.containChar: It must contain at least one capital letter
validations.notContainInfo: It does not contain information such as name
